answerText: X-rays [10] X-ray observations of this pair of colliding galaxies by Chandra allowed the imaging of hot baryonic gas within the cluster. That added to studies of gravitational lensing of this cluster providing strong evidence for dark matter.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2015 | UGA + Ohio State + Editors 1 | 2 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Chandra is a telescope that images light with these frequencies. For 10 points each: [10] Name this form of electromagnetic radiation that has a longer wavelength than gamma rays, but a shorter wavelength than UV radiation.
